content:
The taste... fresh and sweet, hoho.
Actually, these flowers are <color=#8AAB4B>zinnias</color>,
perfect for adding to our tea.

content: I'm not in a hurry. I can lend a hand.
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content:
Since we just arrived, let's make the most of this lovely sunshine.
It's the perfect time to slow down, enjoy some tea, and relax.
We can all chat about settling in together.
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content:
What can we do?
I'm not too familiar with this place...
Let's have Mobai assign the tasks!
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content: I think I'll go sniff around... {短暂停}I mean, investigate, and see if there's anything useful. Alright, I'll count on you two!
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content: I can help, but I want to get settled as soon as possible!
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content: Would you mind helping me gather <color=#8AAB4B>5</color> <color=#8AAB4B>zinnias</color>.

采集花教学_主流程文本

content:
Leave it to me!
I'll make sure to clean every corner of the tables and chairs.
       <size=30>Cleaning... I suppose... I'm not bad at it?</size>
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content: Sani discovered a type of flower here with <color=#8AAB4B>orange and white petals</color>. It looked rather unique at first glance, so I took a whiff... and then had a taste...
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content:
Since we've just arrived, while the sun is shining,
Let's sit down, have some tea together,
And have a nice chat about settling in here, ho~
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content: Hoho, don't worry. The flower may look unusual, but it's actually just <color=#8AAB4B>zinnias</color>, fresh and sweet, perfect for tea.
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content:
When near a zinnia,
press <color=#38b6c5>F</color>
to collect it.
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content:
Hoho, I'll gladly accept the offer.
The tables and chairs we just brought out haven't been used in ages.
Frostia, maybe you could clean off the dust?
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本
采集花教学_主流程文本

content: No problem. Then <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, if you're up for it, you could collect some local ingredients for tea.
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content: Hoho~ <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> and Frostia just got here, but you are already helping out. I really appreciate it!
info: 采集花教学_主流程文本

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, you're here!
We've been waiting for you to discuss
the tea preparations.

content:
Calling it "helping out"...
Actually, it's also a great way for us to get familiar with this place more quickly.
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, don't you agree?
